comments.author: peterpat.8196
comments.body:
If this is reading GW2s memory it is, based on the user agreement, not allowed. If they would introduce a new API allowing this, we would surely be informed of it. (And there is no update on this, see sticky post API Documentation )
There seem to be some applications that do something similar, and even more. But it’s not allowed to use them (EU/ NA), since they “read areas of computer memory or storage devices related to the Game”.

tl;dr: NO, there is no currently existing, allowed in EU/NA, application that does this.
PS: No idea about china, but guessing it’s similar.
